strings.Value: "Hmm… this body is feeble… deprived of magic…" {n}He takes a raking breath, as if growing accustomed to breathing.{/n} "...but it is vital enough for what must be done... Until I find a more suitable vessel."

"It is time to see this world with these new eyes..." {n}He blinks.{/n} "Odd how you perceive the world... I may have to pluck an eye out. And that smell..." {n}He takes another breath, steadier than before.{/n} "No matter. Know that the wards at the tomb entrance are gone — I'll join you there. But..."

"First, you must decide what to do with those souls I captured. I don't know what's more important to you — to preserve the lives of your servants or to take advantage of the work I've done for you. That's all. Go."
